entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:16 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 11:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: ENE 23 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 10:06 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:06 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
